content:
DirectoryServerCollection Class

Definition

The DirectoryServerCollection class is a read/write collection that contains DirectoryServer objects.

In this Article

public class DirectoryServerCollection : System.Collections.CollectionBase
Inheritance
Object
CollectionBase
DirectoryServerCollection

Properties

Item(Int32)

Gets or sets a DirectoryServer object in this collection.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer this[int index] { get; set; }
Parameters
index
Int32

The zero-based index of the DirectoryServer object to get or set.

Value
DirectoryServer

The DirectoryServer object that exists at the specified index.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

The member already exists in this collection (applies to set only).

ArgumentNullException

The item specified is null (applies to set only).

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

The index specified is out of range of this collection.

InvalidOperationException

The DirectoryServer specified has not yet been saved to the Active Directory Domain Services store (applies to set only).

Methods

Add(DirectoryServer)

Appends the specified DirectoryServer object to this collection.

public int Add (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer server);
Parameters
server
DirectoryServer

The DirectoryServer object to append to this collection.

Returns
Int32

The zero-based DirectoryServer object that is appended to this collection.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentException

The object already exists in the collection.

ArgumentNullException

server is null.

InvalidOperationException

The DirectoryServer object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

AddRange(DirectoryServer[])

Appends the contents of the specified DirectoryServer array to this collection.

public void AddRange (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer[] servers);
Parameters
servers
DirectoryServer[]

The DirectoryServer array that contains the objects to append to this collection.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentException

The object already exists in the collection.

ArgumentNullException

servers is null.

InvalidOperationException

The DirectoryServer object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

Contains(DirectoryServer)

Determines if the specified DirectoryServer object is in this collection.

public bool Contains (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer server);
Parameters
server
DirectoryServer

The DirectoryServer object to search for in this collection.

Returns
Boolean

true if the DirectoryServer object is in this collection; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentNullException

server is null.

InvalidOperationException

The DirectoryServer object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

CopyTo(DirectoryServer[], Int32)

Copies all DirectoryServer objects in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.

public void CopyTo (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer[] array, int index);
Parameters
array
DirectoryServer[]

The array of DirectoryServer objects that receives the elements of this collection.

index
Int32

The zero-based index in array where this method starts copying this collection.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

The destination array is not large enough, based on the source collection size and the index specified.

ArgumentNullException

array is null.

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

The index specified is out of range of the destination array.

IndexOf(DirectoryServer)

Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified DirectoryServer object in this array.

public int IndexOf (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer server);
Parameters
server
DirectoryServer

The DirectoryServer object to search for in this collection.

Returns
Int32

The zero-based index of the first matching object. Returns -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the DirectoryServer object.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentNullException

server is null.

InvalidOperationException

The DirectoryServer object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

Insert(Int32, DirectoryServer)

Inserts the specified DirectoryServer object into this collection at the specified index.

public void Insert (int index, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer server);
Parameters
index
Int32

The zero-based index in this collection where the object is inserted.

server
DirectoryServer

The DirectoryServer object to insert into this collection.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentException

The object already exists in the collection.

ArgumentNullException

server is null.

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

The index specified is out of range of the collection.

InvalidOperationException

The DirectoryServer object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

protected override void OnClear ();

Overrides the stem.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClearComplete* method.

protected override void OnClearComplete ();

Overrides the stem.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClearComplete* method.

protected override void OnInsertComplete (int index, object value);
Parameters
index
Int32

The zero-based index at which the element was inserted.

value
Object

The new value of the element at index.

OnRemoveComplete(Int32, Object)

Overrides the stem.Collections.CollectionBase.OnRemoveComplete* method.

protected override void OnRemoveComplete (int index, object value);
Parameters
index
Int32

The zero-based index at which the element was removed.

value
Object

The element that was removed from the collection.

OnSetComplete(Int32, Object, Object)

Overrides the stem.Collections.CollectionBase.OnSetComplete* method.

protected override void OnSetComplete (int index, object oldValue, object newValue);
Parameters
index
Int32

The zero-based index at which the set operation occurred.

oldValue
Object

The element that was replaced by newValue.

newValue
Object

The element that replaced oldValue.

OnValidate(Object)

Overrides the stem.Collections.CollectionBase.OnValidate* method.

protected override void OnValidate (object value);
Parameters
value
Object

The element in this collection to validate.

Remove(DirectoryServer)

Removes the first occurrence of an object in this collection that is identical to the specified DirectoryServer object.

public void Remove (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer server);
Parameters
server
DirectoryServer

The DirectoryServer object to remove from this collection.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentException

The object does not exist in the collection.

ArgumentNullException

server is null.

InvalidOperationException

The DirectoryServer object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
